rows.label: tev073001_JNK0010
rows.name: Inquire[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev073001_SEL0011
rows.name: Ask Sun'barac about Director General Chausson.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev073001_JNK0020
rows.name: Discuss[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev073001_MSG0001
rows.name:
In terms of his aptitude for logical thought and rational
judgment, he's like an Orphean in a human body.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev073001_MSG0002
rows.name:
Humans often display a tendency to let their emotions
complicate attempts at mutual understanding, but we
have no issues communicating with Chausson.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev073001_MSG0003
rows.name:
He seems to be the one spearheading humanity's
proactive embrace of other xenoform races.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev073001_MSG0004
rows.name:
One day I would like to hear him speak in more detail
about his vision for this city.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev073001_SEL1021
rows.name: Ask Sun'barac if anything is troubling him.

rows.label: tev073001_SEL1031
rows.name:
Ask Sun'barac about Ryyz
and her attack on New LA.

rows.label: tev073001_SEL1051
rows.name: Ask Sun'barac about Ryyz and Dagahn.

rows.label: tev073001_SEL1071
rows.name: Ask Sun'barac about the battle for the Lifehold Core.

rows.label: tev073001_SEL1091
rows.name: Ask Sun'barac about Commander Vandham.

rows.label: tev073001_MSG0005
rows.name:
The senirapa water we used on Sun'celeg was the
last of our supply.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev073001_MSG0006
rows.name:
We currently have Kon'luarb researching ways to
cultivate more.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev073001_MSG0007
rows.name:
But if we can't find a pure sample for him to replicate,
his efforts will have been for naught.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev073001_MSG0008
rows.name:
We must find some new senirapa water soon,
so that we can share the radiance of our Ovah with
future generations.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev073001_MSG1001
rows.name:
All those who have drawn her ire—even fellow
Ganglion members—have met brutal deaths.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev073001_MSG1002
rows.name:
The Prone often advised each other to stay on her
good side if they wanted to live.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev073001_MSG1003
rows.name:
You may have successfully repelled her attack this time,
but by my estimation, there's a 96.7 percent chance
that she will return to kill you.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev073001_MSG1004
rows.name:
Please be on guard. I imagine that she will attempt
to hit you with everything she can merely to sate her
own rage and bloodlust.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev073001_MSG1009
rows.name:
I've heard that Ryyz makes anyone who disrespects
Dagahn pay for it in blood—even high-ranking
Ganglion officers.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev073001_MSG1010
rows.name:
I could not even begin to understand why a woman
as heartless, cruel, and self-centered as her would
care so much about defending the honor of another.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev073001_MSG1011
rows.name:
Perhaps you humans would have a better perspective
on the matter.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev073001_MSG1012
rows.name:
Might it be related to the deep bonds of "family"
that humans often speak of?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev073001_MSG1017
rows.name:
If you humans were to perish, we defenseless Orphe
would be slaughtered.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev073001_MSG1018
rows.name: So this battle is not yours alone.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev073001_MSG1019
rows.name:
I wish to see our Ovah passed down to another
generation.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev073001_MSG1020
rows.name:
So for my own interests as well as yours, I would like
nothing more than to see you successfully secure your
Lifehold Core.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev073001_MSG1025
rows.name:
With the destruction of the Ganglion,
our odds of survival have increased dramatically.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev073001_MSG1026
rows.name:
Having inherited the leadership of the Orphe over
Kun'luarb, I went to BLADE HQ to pay the debt my
people owe to yours.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev073001_MSG1027
rows.name:
But a man named Vandham said that wouldn't be
necessary, as it had been a "two-way street."
Though I pressed, he would speak no more of it.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev073001_MSG1028
rows.name:
Do all humans really settle such debts simply by uttering
words of gratitude?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev073001_MSG1029
rows.name:
If that's the case, you are allowing yourselves to be
cheated. You have a right to greater profits.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev073001_SEL2021
rows.name: Ask Sun'barac about recent developments.

rows.label: tev073001_MSG2001
rows.name:
Thanks to the efforts of Kon'luarb and yourself,
the senirapa-water cultivation project is a success.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev073001_MSG2002
rows.name:
However, increasing our population has also left us
facing increased conflict with both humans and the
other beings who live on this ship.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev073001_MSG2003
rows.name:
As the leader of the Orphe, I would like to speak to
your representatives immediately and head off even
greater problems.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev073001_MSG2004
rows.name:
Once an accord is reached, I hope we can count on
you to help any Orphe who ends up embroiled in
such a conflict.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev073001_MSG2005
rows.name:
Since you know us so well, you would be a big help
in resolving these situations. Please consider it![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev073001_SEL3021
rows.name: Ask Sun'barac about recent developments.

rows.label: tev073001_MSG3001
rows.name:
A provisional 20 percent Nopon tax has been
implemented, and everyone on the Ma-non ship is
sharing the cost of providing the discount.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev073001_MSG3002
rows.name:
This has caused the Nopon to begin spending their
accumulated savings, which is an unexpected bonus.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev073001_MSG3003
rows.name:
A lot of the companies are raking in so much profit
that they don't even seem to care about the tax.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev073001_MSG3004
rows.name:
...Hmm. This Kopopo may turn out to be a competent
representative after all.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev073001_MSG3005
rows.name:
I shall continue to support his future policy proposals
with all the fervor I can muster. ...Huzzah.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev073001_MSG4001
rows.name:
The survey you conducted gave me the confidence to
enter the election.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev073001_MSG4002
rows.name:
With support from a wide variety of city residents,
I was ultimately chosen to serve as the xenoform
representative.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev073001_MSG4003
rows.name:
I hope to secure the help of my formal rivals,
Kopopo and Adappin.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev073001_MSG4004
rows.name:
Together, we can transform New LA into a utopia
where peoples of different planets can live together
as equals.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev073001_MSG4005
rows.name:
What humans achieved on Mira was nothing short of a
miracle, and I assure you that I intend to accomplish
no less myself.[ST:wait ]
